original_title: A Body to Die For 2: The Mann Trap
overview: A Body To Die For 2 picks up where A Body To Die for ends. The movie opens at the end of another hot sex session between Mann and his roommate, Mikey (Brad King), who is seducing him on a regular basis in the same style and fashion that he did in the original show.
title: A Body to Die For 2: The Mann Trap
